title: Disintegrate
content:
l ALWAYS succeed against Sleeping targets. Regarding this, unlike the 'Sleep' Spell; 'Eyebite' can be used to reliably inflict Sleep against an enemy, regardless of their HP. Making it possible to guarantee a Disintegration within only 2 actions.
